text: Harisu (, born February 17, 1975) is a South Korean model, actor, and entertainer. Harisu (or Ha Ri-soo) is her stage name. Her real name is Lee Kyung-eun ()."Ha Ri-soo Appeal to the Law", dongA.com, December 4, 2002. She was born male, as Lee Kyung-yeop (). She had a sex change operation in Japan in 1999. She is South Korea's first transgender entertainer. On May 19, 2007, Harisu married Micky Chung, a Korean singer.‘Highway Star’ Most Searched on Internet Koreatimes 2007.02.25 == Related pages == * Lee Si-yeon * Hong Seok- cheon == References == == Other websites == * Harisu at HanCinema * Harisu * Harisu discography at FormulaRecordings * Facebook Fan Page Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean models Category:South Korean singers Category:South Korean actors Category:Transgender women Category:K-pop singers
title: Harisu
